definition: to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: Yet the attraction simmers on for the better part of the next two decades.
sentences.chinese: 然而，对更好的未来二十年的吸引力蕴积。

definition: pent-up frustrations/sth that has accumulated in one's mind for a long time
to be contaminated/to be gradually influenced
to gush/to squirt/to surge/to well out/to overflow
to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
to grow (usually of abstract things)/to yield/to develop
